articles.title: Erin Franke
articles.description:
Hi, I'm Erin Franke. I currently attend Macalester College and am majoring in Statistics with Economics and Computer Science minors. I will be graduating in May 2023 and am interested in pursuing a career as a data scientist. This summer (2022) I joined the Minnesota Twins as a Baseball Research Fellow where I used R and SQL to apply statistical techinques in efforts to analyze players and baseball strategy. 

Currently I am working on an independent honors project related to the intersection of gentrification and crime [(github here)](https://github.com/efranke22/honorsGentrification). Another recent project I have worked on is a spatial analysis of [blood lead levels](https://github.com/efranke22/nick-erin-capstone) of children in the Twin Cities.
articles.contents:
Education
BA in Statistics, 2023Macalester College: Saint Paul, MN
Northside College Preparatory High School of Chicago, IL 2015-2019
For more information on my education, work, internship, and research experience, please check out my resume.
A little more about me
In addition to my academics, I also enjoy running distance for Macalester Track & Field and Cross Country, volunteering at my local food pantry in Chicago, hiking, and watching baseball (especially the Twins and Cubs)!

Contact
It is easiest to contact me by email at efranke@macalester.edu!
